mapper.select: SELECT P.P_NAME, TO_CHAR(P.P_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(P.P_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS P_END_DATE, TO_CHAR(P.PJ_START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(P.PJ_END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS PJ_END_DATE, P.P_INFO_CONTENT, P.P_INFO_REFO, P.P_UPDATE_DATE, U.U_NICKNAME, RP.REGION_PART, PP.PLATFORM_PART, SP.SKILL_PART, DP.DEPARTMENT_PART, SP.SUBJECT_PART FROM P P, U U, REGION_PART RP, PLATFORM_PART PP, SKILL_PART SP, DEPARTMENT_PART DP, SUBJECT_PART SP WHERE P.P_CODE = #{p_code} AND P.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE AND P.REGION_PART_CODE = RP.REGION_PART_CODE AND P.PLATFORM_PART_CODE = PP.PLATFORM_PART_CODE AND P.SKILL_PART_CODE = SP.SKILL_PART_CODE AND P.DEPARTMENT_PART_CODE = DP.DEPARTMENT_PART_CODE AND P.SUBJECT_PART_CODE = SP.SUBJECT_PART_CODE

SELECT PPT.POSITION_PART, PP.P_POSITION_COUNT, NVL((SELECT COUNT(UPA.P_POSITION_CODE) FROM U_P_APPLY UPA WHERE UPA.U_P_READY_DATE IS NOT NULL AND PP.P_POSITION_CODE = UPA.P_POSITION_CODE GROUP BY PP.POSITION_PART_CODE),0) AS P_APPLY_COUNT FROM P_POSITION PP, POSITION_PART PPT WHERE PP.POSITION_PART_CODE = PPT.POSITION_PART_CODE AND PP.P_CODE = #{p_code} ORDER BY PP.P_POSITION_CODE

SELECT PPP.POSITION_PART, U.U_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(UPA.U_P_APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS U_P_APPLY_DATE, UPA. U_P_APPLY_REASON, P.P_CODE FROM U_P_APPLY UPA, U U, P P, P_POSITION PP, POSITION_PART PPP WHERE P.P_CODE = PP.P_CODE AND PP.POSITION_PART_CODE = PPP.POSITION_PART_CODE AND PP.P_POSITION_CODE = UPA.P_POSITION_CODE AND UPA.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE AND PP.P_POSITION_CODE = UPA.P_POSITION_CODE AND P.P_CODE = #{p_code} AND UPA.U_P_READY_DATE IS NOT NULL ORDER BY U_P_APPLY_DATE

SELECT DISTINCT U.U_NICKNAME, U.U_PORTFOLIO_URL, U.U_INTRO, USP.U_SKILL_PART, SP.SKILL_PART FROM USER_MAIN UM, U U, P P, U_SKILL US, U_SKILL_PART USP, SKILL_PART SP WHERE U.USER_CODE = P.USER_CODE AND P.P_CODE = #{p_code} AND U.USER_CODE = US.USER_CODE AND US.SKILL_PART_CODE = SP.SKILL_PART_CODE AND US.U_SKILL_PART_CODE = USP.U_SKILL_PART_CODE ORDER BY 4

SELECT COUNT(*) AS IN_BLACKLIST FROM P P, P_POSITION PP, U_P_APPLY UPA, P_REJECT PR, REJECT_CONDITION RC WHERE P.P_CODE = #{p_code} AND PP. P_POSITION_CODE = UPA.P_POSITION_CODE AND UPA.U_P_APPLY_CODE = PR.U_P_APPLY_CODE AND RC.REJECT_CONDITION_CODE = 'RJC0000002' AND UPA.USER_CODE = #{user_code}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS IN_PROGRESS_PROJECT FROM U_P_APPLY UPA, P_POSITION PP, P_TEAM_CONFIRM PTC, P_END PE WHERE UPA.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND UPA.P_POSITION_CODE = PP.P_POSITION_CODE AND PP.P_CODE = PTC.P_CODE AND PTC.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE != PE.P_TEAM_CONFIRM_CODE

SELECT COUNT(*) AS IN_PROGRESS_APPLY FROM U_P_APPLY UPA JOIN P_POSITION PP ON UPA.USER_CODE = #{user_code} AND UPA.P_POSITION_CODE = PP.P_POSITION_CODE LEFT JOIN P_TEAM_CONFIRM PTC ON PP.P_CODE = PTC.P_CODE LEFT JOIN P_FAILED PF ON PP.P_CODE = PF.P_CODE WHERE PTC.P_CODE IS NULL AND PF.P_CODE IS NULL

SELECT DISTINCT P_POSITION_CODE FROM P_POSITION PP WHERE (SELECT POSITION_PART_CODE FROM POSITION_PART PPT WHERE PPT.POSITION_PART = #{position_part}) = PP.POSITION_PART_CODE AND PP.P_CODE = #{p_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO U_P_APPLY(U_P_APPLY_CODE, P_POSITION_CODE, USER_CODE, U_P_APPLY_REASON, U_P_APPLY_DATE, U_P_READY_DATE) VALUES('UPA'||LPAD(U_P_APPLY_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, 7, '0'), #{p_position_code}, #{user_code}, #{u_p_apply_reason}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
